kchandra423.kImages

Class KImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • kchandra423.kImages.KImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scalable

    public abstract class KImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scalable
    A basic class for representing an Image. Supports all files types supported by java advanced imaging, and animates gifs
    See Also:
    PApplet
